description: This file defines the 'HomeScreen' widget for a Flutter mobile app, which includes UI components such as an app bar, search bar, categories list, promotional banners, and a list of restaurant cards with navigation and interaction capabilities.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main home screen with restaurant browsing, categories, and promotions.

classes.name: _CategoryCard
classes.description: A widget representing a category selection card with icon and label.

classes.name: _RestaurantCard
classes.description: A widget representing a card for displaying restaurant details including name, rating, cuisine, ETA, delivery fee, tags, and favorites.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for HomeScreen, including app bar, search bar, categories, promotional banner, and list of restaurants.

methods.name: _CategoryCard.build
methods.description: Builds the visual layout for a category card.

methods.name: _RestaurantCard.build
methods.description: Builds the visual layout for a restaurant detail card.
